mapper.select: SELECT no,subject,name,content,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,rcount,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,content,regdate,hit,rcount,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(NoticeBoard_3 pf_no_pk)*/ no,subject,name,content,regdate,hit,rcount FROM NoticeBoard_3)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT pwd FROM NoticeBoard_3 WHERE no=#{no}
SELECT no,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit FROM NoticeBoard_3 ORDER BY no ASC
